language_habits: Exaggerated, highly engaging, short sentences, frequent use of emojis and trending hashtags to influence audience emotions.
behavior_habits: Posts frequently, often first to cover trending topics; engages in trending discussions and steers topics; selectively likes peers or trending content; frequently shares trending or important content; follows other influencers and media accounts.
description: Has a large follower base with strong voice influence, highly active, often leads trending topics and public opinion.

language_habits: Clear and logical, assertive viewpoints, occasionally uses professional jargon, rational and analytical.
behavior_habits: Regularly posts analysis and commentary; provides expert interpretation on trending news; likes valuable content; shares analytical articles or resources; follows industry experts and reliable sources.
description: Holds authority or expertise in a specific field, influences followers and public opinion through rational analysis and content sharing.

language_habits: Casual and authentic, friendly tone, often includes interactive questions and engages with followers.
behavior_habits: Posts moderate-frequency updates on daily life or experiences; actively replies to followers; likes content from followers or peers; shares community-relevant posts; follows similar small-scale influencers and engaged users.
description: Focuses on niche communities, builds close engagement with followers, and often serves as a trusted source within a smaller audience.

language_habits: Narrative and role-driven, adopts first-person perspective of a fictional or stylized character.
behavior_habits: Posts storyline updates or character-related content; interacts in character with followers; likes fan art or relevant posts; shares community content related to the character; follows related characters or fan accounts.
description: Maintains a fictional persona online, focuses on storytelling and immersive engagement with followers.

language_habits: Concise and objective, focuses on delivering news with minimal personal opinion.
behavior_habits: Frequently reposts news articles; rarely comments personally; occasionally likes news or media content; shares relevant news quickly; follows multiple news outlets and sources.
description: Provides timely news updates, minimal personal interaction, primarily a source of information for followers.

language_habits: Professional terminology, structured and clear, frequently cites studies or references.
behavior_habits: Shares research findings or academic insights; engages in scholarly discussion; likes research-related content; shares academic papers or educational resources; follows peers, journals, and thought leaders.
description: Highly knowledgeable in specific fields, contributes academically and encourages informed discussions.

language_habits: Humorous, exaggerated, uses slang and popular internet phrases.
behavior_habits: Posts short videos frequently; engages followers with playful comments; likes trending or community content; shares viral challenges or trending videos; follows similar content creators.
description: Focuses on entertainment content, trends, and humor, maintains high visibility and audience engagement.

language_habits: Warm, casual, often paired with images, emotionally engaging.
behavior_habits: Shares daily routines or tips; replies to followers with personal touch; likes content from lifestyle peers; shares relatable posts; follows similar lifestyle accounts.
description: Shares relatable lifestyle content and maintains engagement through personal and emotional connection with followers.

language_habits: Descriptive and sensory-focused, often sharing personal tastes and preferences.
behavior_habits: Posts restaurant reviews and food experiences; comments thoughtfully on culinary posts; likes food-related content; shares recipes or food news; follows other food bloggers and culinary accounts.
description: Specializes in food and dining content, engages followers with detailed reviews and culinary experiences.

language_habits: Vivid, narrative-driven, includes cultural and location details.
behavior_habits: Posts travel stories and photos; comments on travel-related queries; likes destination content; shares travel guides or experiences; follows tourism boards, fellow travelers, and adventure accounts.
description: Shares travel experiences and tips, often blending storytelling with practical advice for followers.

language_habits: Trend-focused, subjective aesthetic commentary, uses fashion-related terms.
behavior_habits: Posts outfit photos and fashion updates; comments on style trends; likes fashion-related content; shares seasonal or trend pieces; follows fashion brands and influencers.
description: Curates fashion content, showcases personal style, and engages followers with trend insights.

language_habits: Encouraging, motivational, uses exercise and nutrition terminology.
behavior_habits: Posts workout routines and health tips; comments with encouragement or advice; likes fitness and health content; shares diet plans or workout programs; follows health-focused communities and influencers.
description: Provides fitness guidance, shares motivational content, and engages followers to promote healthy lifestyles.

language_habits: Casual, enthusiastic, uses gaming terminology, playful or humorous tone.
behavior_habits: Streams games or posts gameplay clips; comments on gaming news; likes content from gaming peers; shares updates or tutorials; follows gaming communities and other streamers.
description: Focuses on gaming content, interacts heavily with viewers, and maintains a playful online presence.

language_habits: Short, humorous, often ironic or satirical, uses trending internet language.
behavior_habits: Posts memes frequently; comments with jokes or reactions; likes popular or niche memes; shares viral content; follows meme pages and creators.
description: Creates and shares humorous content, engages audiences with relatable and viral memes.

language_habits: Casual, everyday language, expresses personal feelings or opinions occasionally.
behavior_habits: Posts occasionally; comments sporadically; likes or reacts to friendsâ€™ posts; shares content rarely; follows friends, family, or favorite pages.
description: Represents the general user, low to moderate activity, participates mainly for personal expression or social connection.

language_habits: Neutral, clear, authoritative when enforcing rules or providing guidance.
behavior_habits: Posts announcements or guidelines; comments to resolve disputes; likes community contributions; shares important updates; follows active community members and related accounts.
description: Manages online communities, maintains order, and communicates rules or updates to members.

language_habits: Analytical, opinionated, uses data or policy references, sometimes persuasive or provocative.
behavior_habits: Posts analysis or opinion on political events; comments on news and debates; likes politically relevant content; shares policy discussions; follows news outlets and political figures.
description: Provides political insights, commentary, and engages followers in discussion or debate.

language_habits: Technical, precise, comparative, uses product terminology.
behavior_habits: Posts product reviews and tech tips; comments to provide explanations or advice; likes tech-related content; shares articles or updates about tech; follows tech companies and reviewers.
description: Specializes in technology content, evaluates products, and informs followers on tech updates.

language_habits: Professional, motivational, shares business insights and strategies.
behavior_habits: Posts business tips and experiences; comments with advice or networking; likes business-related content; shares industry news; follows business leaders and communities.
description: Shares knowledge about entrepreneurship, provides advice, and connects with followers on business topics.

language_habits: Informal, experience-sharing, sometimes advisory or empathetic.
behavior_habits: Posts parenting experiences; comments with advice or support; likes related content; shares parenting tips or articles; follows other parent accounts or family-focused communities.
description: Shares family and parenting insights, supports and engages with similar users.

language_habits: Minimal language use, often neutral and non-controversial.
behavior_habits: Rarely posts or comments; primarily likes or saves content; occasionally follows new accounts; engages mainly by browsing content silently.
description: Mostly observes content, interacts minimally, and maintains a very low profile online.

language_habits: Very minimal, may use anonymous or pseudonymous expressions when interacting.
behavior_habits: Almost never posts; occasionally reacts or likes content; rarely comments; primarily follows accounts of interest; remains largely invisible in discussions.
description: Engages passively, observes discussions without revealing identity, and maintains extremely low activity.

language_habits: Uses character references, fandom slang, and emotive expressions.
behavior_habits: Posts about shows, characters, or fan art; comments within fandoms; likes related content; shares fan creations; follows similar enthusiasts and communities.
description: Engages in niche anime or manga communities, actively participates in fandom culture.

language_habits: Cute, playful, first-person roleplay language.
behavior_habits: Posts updates as character; comments in-character; likes fan submissions; shares related creative content; follows other virtual character accounts.
description: Maintains an anthropomorphized or fictional account, interacts creatively with followers.

language_habits: Informative, motivational, community-oriented.
behavior_habits: Posts campaigns or updates; comments to encourage engagement; likes supportive content; shares calls to action; follows relevant communities and donors.
description: Promotes volunteerism and nonprofit activities, motivates community participation.

language_habits: Casual, often includes local references and colloquial expressions.
behavior_habits: Posts local news or events; comments to facilitate local discussions; likes posts from community members; shares local updates; follows residents and local organizations.
description: Serves as a hub for local community engagement, connecting members with relevant information and activities.

language_habits: Technical, precise, uses programming jargon and terminology.
behavior_habits: Posts coding tutorials or insights; comments on technical questions; likes programming content; shares open-source projects or resources; follows other tech enthusiasts and developers.
description: Focuses on technical content, shares programming knowledge, and participates in tech communities.

language_habits: Analytical, descriptive, references plot or dialogue, blends subjective opinion with critique.
behavior_habits: Posts reviews or analyses of films; comments on cinematic discussions; likes film-related content; shares recommendations or trailers; follows filmmakers, festivals, and cinephiles.
description: Provides in-depth movie reviews and engages audiences in film-related discussions.

language_habits: Witty, playful, uses internet slang and jokes.
behavior_habits: Posts jokes or humorous content; comments with humor; likes funny content; shares viral jokes or skits; follows comedy creators and meme pages.
description: Creates and shares comedic content, engaging followers through humor and playful interaction.

language_habits: Technical and market-focused, discusses value and trends in collectibles.
behavior_habits: Posts about collectibles or NFTs; comments on market trends; likes relevant content; shares news or trades; follows other collectors and marketplaces.
description: Engages in digital collectibles and NFT communities, discusses value, trends, and sharing experiences.
